document_data.name: Ansiber
document_data.sex: MalePer p. 67 of the Ruins of Zhentil Keep campaign book, Striking Hand refers to 7th level. As he is offered ascension to the Inner Ring, Ansiber cannot be higher than 10th level. Given the reference to Brothers, Ansiber is assumed to be male for the purposes of this article.
document_data.Abilities: He was of Brother of the Striking Hand rank, or greater.
document_data.Relationships: His name was known to [[Fzoul Chembryl]], who considered him to be Brother of the Striking Hand rank or greater.
document_data.History: After [[Shandril Shessair]]'s first escape from the [[Citadel of the Raven]], Fzoul ordered all priests higher in rank than Brother of the Striking Hand to sweep the Citadel, in order to find her, promising instant ascension to the Inner Circle for whoever found her.
